Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.2 Hetuduka, Vedanāttika » 1.2.2 Dukkhāyavedanāyasampayuttapada » 1.2.2.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Nahetu-naadhipati
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Vedanāttika
Dukkhāyavedanāyasampayuttapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Nahetu-naadhipati
85.
144Nahetuṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā (1)
86.
145Hetuṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
87.
146Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ. (Paccanīyaṃ.)
147Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ, anulomapaccanīyaṃ.)
148Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ, paccanīyānulomaṃ.)
149(Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
